Title: Strange Circus
Actors: Masumi Miyazaki, Issei Ishida, Rie Kuwana, Seiko IwaidÃ´
Plot: The erotic novelist Taeko is writing a morbid story of a family destroyed by incest, murder and abuse. Her assistant, Yuji, sets on a mission to uncover the reality of this story, but the reality might be too much to bear.
